title: Jacob Rothschild, 4th Baron Rothschild
summary: Nathaniel Charles Jacob Rothschild, 4th Baron Rothschild, OM, GBE, CVO, FRCA FBA FKC (born 29 April 1936) is a British peer and investment banker and a member of the prominent Rothschild banking family. He is also honorary president of the Institute for Jewish Policy Research.[1]
